title: HOUR 1 - Durant, Jackson, Mitchell
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Durant, Jackson, Mitchell
description:
The NBA owners aren't happy with Kevin Durant wanting to be traded with 4 years left on his contract

The Twitter feud between Lamar Jackson and Bernard Pollard

Will the Knicks do what it takes to get Donovan Mitchell?

 

Guest: Nick Wright

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
